verses.verse: וַיַּרְאֵ֗נִי <S%H7200><s%> And he shewed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוֹשֻׁ֙עַ֙ <S%H3091><s%> me Joshua הַכֹּהֵ֣ן <S%H3548><s%> priest הַגָּד֔וֹל <S%H1419><s%> the high עֹמֵ֕ד <S%H5975><s%> standing לִפְנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> before מַלְאַ֣ךְ <S%H4397><s%> the angel יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וְהַשָּׂטָ֛ן <S%H7854><s%> and Satan עֹמֵ֥ד <S%H5975><s%> standing עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> at יְמִינ֖וֹ <S%H3225><s%> at his right hand לְשִׂטְנֽוֹ׃ <S%H7853><s%> to resist

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַשָּׂטָ֗ן <S%H7854><s%> unto Satan יִגְעַ֨ר <S%H1605><s%> rebuke יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD בְּךָ֙ הַשָּׂטָ֔ן <S%H7854><s%> thee O Satan וְיִגְעַ֤ר <S%H1605><s%> rebuke יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> even the LORD בְּךָ֔ הַבֹּחֵ֖ר <S%H977><s%> that hath chosen בִּירֽוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> Jerusalem הֲל֧וֹא <S%H3808><s%> not זֶ֦ה <S%H2088><s%> is this א֖וּד <S%H181><s%> thee [is] not this a brand מֻצָּ֥ל <S%H5337><s%> plucked מֵאֵֽשׁ׃ <S%H784><s%> burning

וִיהוֹשֻׁ֕עַ <S%H3091><s%> Now Joshua הָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> become לָבֻ֖שׁ <S%H3847><s%> was clothed בְּגָדִ֣ים <S%H899><s%> garments צוֹאִ֑ים <S%H6674><s%> with filthy וְעֹמֵ֖ד <S%H5975><s%> and stood לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> before הַמַּלְאָֽךְ׃ <S%H4397><s%> the angel

וַיַּ֣עַן <S%H6030><s%> And he answered וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and spake אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הָעֹמְדִ֤ים <S%H5975><s%> unto those that stood לְפָנָיו֙ <S%H6440><s%> before לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> him saying הָסִ֛ירוּ <S%H5493><s%> Take away הַבְּגָדִ֥ים <S%H899><s%> garments הַצֹּאִ֖ים <S%H6674><s%> the filthy מֵעָלָ֑יו <S%H5921><s%> and וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> from him And unto him he said אֵלָ֗יו <S%H413><s%> to him רְאֵ֨ה <S%H7200><s%> Behold הֶעֱבַ֤רְתִּי <S%H5674><s%> to pass מֵעָלֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H5921><s%> and עֲוֹנֶ֔ךָ <S%H5771><s%> I have caused thine iniquity וְהַלְבֵּ֥שׁ <S%H3847><s%> from thee and I will clothe אֹתְךָ֖ <S%H853><s%> מַחֲלָצֽוֹת׃ <S%H4254><s%> thee with change of raiment

וָאֹמַ֕ר <S%H559><s%> And I said יָשִׂ֛ימוּ <S%H7760><s%> Let them set צָנִ֥יף <S%H6797><s%> mitre טָה֖וֹר <S%H2889><s%> a fair עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on רֹאשׁ֑וֹ <S%H7218><s%> upon his head וַיָּשִׂימוּ֩ <S%H7760><s%> So they set הַצָּנִ֨יף <S%H6797><s%> mitre הַטָּה֜וֹר <S%H2889><s%> a fair עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on רֹאשׁ֗וֹ <S%H7218><s%> upon his head וַיַּלְבִּשֻׁ֙הוּ֙ <S%H3847><s%> and clothed בְּגָדִ֔ים <S%H899><s%> him with garments וּמַלְאַ֥ךְ <S%H4397><s%> And the angel יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD עֹמֵֽד׃ <S%H5975><s%> stood by
וַיָּ֙עַד֙ <S%H5749><s%> protested מַלְאַ֣ךְ <S%H4397><s%> And the angel יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> God בִּיהוֹשֻׁ֖עַ <S%H3091><s%> unto Joshua לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

כֹּה־ <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֞ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD צְבָא֗וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If בִּדְרָכַ֤י <S%H1870><s%> in my ways תֵּלֵךְ֙ <S%H1980><s%> will walk וְאִ֣ם <S%H518><s%> and if אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִשְׁמַרְתִּ֣י <S%H4931><s%> my charge תִשְׁמֹ֔ר <S%H8104><s%> and if thou wilt keep וְגַם־ <S%H1571><s%> will also אַתָּה֙ <S%H859><s%> you תָּדִ֣ין <S%H1777><s%> then thou shalt also judge אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בֵּיתִ֔י <S%H1004><s%> my house וְגַ֖ם <S%H1571><s%> and also תִּשְׁמֹ֣ר <S%H8104><s%> and shalt also keep אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חֲצֵרָ֑י <S%H2691><s%> my courts וְנָתַתִּ֤י <S%H5414><s%> and I will give לְךָ֙ מַהְלְכִ֔ים <S%H4108><s%> thee places to walk בֵּ֥ין <S%H996><s%> among הָעֹמְדִ֖ים <S%H5975><s%> among these that stand by הָאֵֽלֶּה׃ <S%H428><s%> these

שְֽׁמַֽע־ <S%H8085><s%> Hear נָ֞א <S%H4994><s%> Now יְהוֹשֻׁ֣עַ ׀ <S%H3091><s%> now O Joshua הַכֹּהֵ֣ן <S%H3548><s%> priest הַגָּד֗וֹל <S%H1419><s%> the high אַתָּה֙ <S%H859><s%> you וְרֵעֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H7453><s%> thou and thy fellows הַיֹּשְׁבִ֣ים <S%H3427><s%> that sit לְפָנֶ֔יךָ <S%H6440><s%> before כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> indeed אַנְשֵׁ֥י <S%H376><s%> are men מוֹפֵ֖ת <S%H4159><s%> wondered at הֵ֑מָּה <S%H1992><s%> like כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> indeed הִנְנִ֥י <S%H2005><s%> I am going מֵבִ֛יא <S%H935><s%> for behold I will bring forth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עַבְדִּ֖י <S%H5650><s%> my servant צֶֽמַח׃ <S%H6780><s%> the BRANCH

כִּ֣י ׀ <S%H3588><s%> For הִנֵּ֣ה <S%H2009><s%> behold הָאֶ֗בֶן <S%H68><s%> For behold the stone אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> i נָתַ֙תִּי֙ <S%H5414><s%> that I have laid לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוֹשֻׁ֔עַ <S%H3091><s%> Joshua עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and אֶ֥בֶן <S%H68><s%> stone אַחַ֖ת <S%H259><s%> upon one שִׁבְעָ֣ה <S%H7651><s%> [shall be] seven עֵינָ֑יִם <S%H5869><s%> eyes הִנְנִ֧י <S%H2005><s%> behold מְפַתֵּ֣חַ <S%H6605><s%> behold I will engrave פִּתֻּחָ֗הּ <S%H6603><s%> the graving נְאֻם֙ <S%H5002><s%> thereof saith יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD צְבָא֔וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts וּמַשְׁתִּ֛י <S%H4185><s%> and I will remove אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֲוֹ֥ן <S%H5771><s%> the iniquity הָאָֽרֶץ־ <S%H776><s%> of that land הַהִ֖יא <S%H1931><s%> he בְּי֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day אֶחָֽד׃ <S%H259><s%> in one

בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> In that day הַה֗וּא <S%H1931><s%> he נְאֻם֙ <S%H5002><s%> saith יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD צְבָא֔וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts תִּקְרְא֖וּ <S%H7121><s%> shall ye call אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> every man לְרֵעֵ֑הוּ <S%H7453><s%> his neighbour אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about תַּ֥חַת <S%H8478><s%> under גֶּ֖פֶן <S%H1612><s%> under the vine וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> and תַּ֥חַת <S%H8478><s%> under תְּאֵנָֽה׃ <S%H8384><s%> and under the fig tree
